Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.

add_synapses(label, synlist, mode='from_anatomical_synapse_mapper')[source]¶

mode:

‘from_anatomical_synapse_mapper’: to be used if synlist is generated from landmark as it is done

with mikes manually mapped VPM synapses

‘id_relative_position’: as in the syn file. Use something like [(syn.secID, syn.x) for syn in cell.synapses[‘VPM_C2’]]

to use synapses defined in a single_cell_parser.cell object

Careful: z-depth only accurate for D2-registered cells!

returns a series that contains the pia distance as index and a tuple (biforcation order, section) as value

normalizes bins such that soma is at 0, hot zone is at 1 and most distral branch is at 2

project_specific_ipynb_code.hot_zone.register_point_to_cell(point, cell, max_dist=100)[source]¶
project_specific_ipynb_code.hot_zone.register_point_to_line(line_point_1, line_point_2, point)[source]¶

registers a point to a line from line_point_1 to line_point_2.

Returns: distance, x, projected_point

distance: how much the poin gets moved x: between 0 and 1.

0 means, the registered point is identical to line_point_1. 1 means, the registered point is identical to line_point_1.

projected_point: 3d coordinates of registered point

project_specific_ipynb_code.hot_zone.unnormalize_bins(bins, bifur, max_dist)[source]¶

reverses the normalization
